## DisplacementFeature interface

Interface to be implemented by materials that use displacement maps to overlay geometry on elevation data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DisplacementFeature extends HiddenThreeJSMaterialProperties 
```

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [displacementMap](./harp-materials.displacementfeature.displacementmap.md) | THREE.Texture \| null |  |
